description: Comprehensive description of data contained within this dataset.
title: NUTS1 Regional Gross Disposable Household Income

breadcrumb.title: Home
breadcrumb.summary: The UK's largest independent producer of official statistics and the recognised national statistical institute of the UK.

breadcrumb.title: Economy
breadcrumb.summary: An economy or economic system consists of the production, distribution, consumption and trade of limited goods and services by different agents in a given geographical location. The economic agents can be individuals, businesses, organisations, or governments.

breadcrumb.title: Regional accounts
breadcrumb.summary: Regional Accounts are accounts for regions, sub-regions and local areas of the UK, produced according to the same concepts and definitions used in the National Accounts.  These accounts allow comparisons between regions and comparisons of a region against a UK average. Key statistics here are regional Gross Value Added (GVA) statistics and figures on regional Gross Disposable Household Income.
